reg.name: Decision matrix row 1: Oaddr
reg.description: Row 1 of decision matrix. Originating address. Set to nickname for node that should trigger action.\n Oaddr is the originating address. We are only interested in messages from the node given here.\n 0X00 is segment controller and 0xff is a node without a nickname. If bit 6 of flags is set oaddr will not be checked and events from all nodes will be accepted.

reg.name: Decision matrix row 1: flags
reg.description:
Row 1 of decision matrix. Flags. Set selection behaviour.
 The enable bit can be used to disable a decion matrix row while it is edited.
 The zone and use subzone bits can be activated to have a check on the zone/subzone information of an event.
 That is the zone/subzone of the machine must match the one of the event to trigger the DM row.
